name: Falcon Aviation
about: Falcon Aviation Academy, based in Athens, GA, is a leading institution for standardized airline-quality pilot training. Founded with the objective of providing modern, affordable, and high-quality flight training, the academy aims to contribute skilled pilots to the aviation industry. The training curriculum emphasizes a blend of ground instruction and simulator-based learning using state-of-the-art Redbird MCX full-motion simulators, which reduce training costs and duration. Theoretical studies are prioritized before actual flight training, ensuring trainees are well-prepared. Led by Managing Director Harsh Vardhan Pratap Singh, a seasoned pilot with licenses from India, the USA, and Canada, Falcon Aviation Academy focuses on performance, safety, and career advancement, making it a premier choice for aspiring pilots.
